question: Which CSS property do you use for fade in or fade out animations?
feedback: CSS3 transition animations make elements appear and disappear via the opacity property.

question: When the DOM (document object model) has been loaded, where would the jQuery events and functions run inside?
feedback: Code included inside $(document).ready() runs after all of the resources (HTML, CSS and JS files) have been loaded for the page.

question: $this is a reference to the current _________ in PHP.
feedback: $this is a reference to the calling object and it can be used in class methods only.
